content.detailedDescription:
I went out to smoke a cigerrette in the back yard like i always do and was looking up at the stars. i am a backyard astronomer so i am familiar with my night sky so while i was up looking at the stars smoking i saw this dark triangle. it looked like it had very very faint very very slow flashing flight lights on the corners. what was so eerie was the triangle blocked out the stars behind it as it flew across. it made no sound which was so freaking eerie. 30 minutes laters and i still have the hair on my arms standing on end and i just needed to report it.

i noticed it pretty high in the northern sky and it flew in a straight line and it disappeared into the night heading in a north eastern direction. 

date 11/11/2016
time  1920 central
memphis tn
content.summary: Silent dark fast triangle

content.detailedDescription:
i was in my backyard in fresno,ca. i was taking random photos of the sky just before and during sunset. the weather was warm with scattered light clouds. i did not see the object in question
i only saw the object on my photo after i uploaded it to my mac iphoto. i was very surprised and
taken back when i captured another ufo on my photos. this clearly did not look like a typical plane. this object was ovals/disc shaped and solid black with no windows, wings and not sound.
it must have travelled fast since i did not see it. i was the only person in my backyard.
this happened on november 11, 2016 around 6pm or so. i have over 200 photos of ufo's
that i have when i take random photos of the sky. some photos have one other may have three
objects. i do not have photoshop. i own a nikon d3300. i have also included other photos to share.


            thank you
content.summary: Just taking photos from my backyard it wasn't until i uploaded my image i then saw the black object.

content.detailedDescription: It was laid at night. i was laying in my bed with my boyfriend he was sleeping but i could not sleep i was looking out of the window and saw a big light first i thought it was a big star but it looked like it was moving around. i got out of bed and walked over to the window and looks out of the window blinds then i saw there was 4 big "stars" and they were moving so i know there that it wasn't stars it was like they was connected to each other like a triangle when one light was moving the others was following. first i thought "okay i'm tired and there's something wrong with my eyes" i looked away scratched my eyes and looked back there they were 4 beautiful lights moving so elegantly on the sky. i had to wake up my boyfriend but he was too tired to take it seriously and listen i was so hipnosist by the lights that i watched them for about an hour it was like thay was dancing with flouting movements. i almost couldn't hold my eyes open i was so tired so i got back to bed but i wasn't taking my eyes off the lights they were still there at last i felt too sleep. i never saw them disappear so how long they were there i don't know but one thing is for sure it was so fascinating and i couldn't take my eyes off them. unfortunately i couldn't get a picture or a video i tried with my phone but it was messed up by the reflection of the window i could off cause had gone outside but it was so late now i really regret that i didn't do it. but i will never forget the lights they are printed in my mind.
content.summary: 4 lights on the sky connected like a triangle.

content.detailedDescription:
I was eating supper and had just finished.  i looked out our patio window which overlooks a road (see picture) when i saw an odd light.  i watched it for a few minutes then went outside on to the deck to get a better look.  it was completely stationary and kept pulsating colours (from white to orangish to redish and back again ever few seconds).  i kept going through the things in my head it could be, but it was just so odd and out of place (i can see this spot from where i sit at the table for years and have never seen a light, let alone anything like that).  i tried to take mental notes about it's size and location and figured it was fairly big, probably bigger then a car and at least 100ft off the ground (possibly 200ft even).  at this point i was perplexed and asked my wife to take a look.  she had no idea what it was either but thought it was really odd and definitely out of place.  my kids even took a look.  after a few minutes (probably 5 minutes total), my wife said i should get a better look with the binoculars.  i was hesitant as the last few times i've done this, the object has disappeared.  so, i went inside for about 15-20 seconds and when i came back out, the object was gone.  i have no idea where it went or how it disappeared (which might have helped me determine what it might have been).  

it was definitely and odd object and out of place as i know the area well and see it ever night when eating supper.  i did get a few pictures (object just above and to left of pole and just to the right of the road) and a video, but the video does not show up anything, just the cars.  the pictures do show something though, especially when you zoom in.
content.summary: Glowing and pulsating object seen down the road - colours pulsated from white to orange to a redish colour cyclically

content.detailedDescription: I was walking my dog outside just after 6:00 pm and saw something out of the corner of my eye and looks directly upwards. i then noticed a bright white teardrop shaped flame/glow moving from east to west pretty slowly. once i realized i had no idea what this was i got my phone out and recorded a short video of the light moving across the sky. when the light moved behind the trees, i stopped the video and ran to the other side of them along the road, taking about 15-20 seconds, filming the second video where the white orb had turned into three stationary orbs that were continuously glowing. these three lights then seemed to slowly fade out of sight, i am not sure if they were getting closer to the ground or just out of visual range.
content.summary: White orb flaming across sky then separates into 3 orbs and hovers

content.detailedDescription:
when i took this photo i was in my backyard near sundown just taking photos of the sky.
it wasn't until i uploaded my images to my iphoto that i saw the object. it must have been
moving fast i am guessing since i don't recall seeing it. the object in my photo looks very
dark and solid. no noise was heard and i was the only person out in my backyard. it was
a warm evening with light scattered clouds. when i first saw the object in question in
my photo i couldn't believe how close and big it is. the object did not have wings or windows
from what i can see. just looks solid black. it seems when i take random photos i always catch
some kind of an object. at times i catch several. i have over 200 ufo photos. i also included other 
ufo photos with a helicopter and another photo of a v shaped object pretty close.


                     thank you
content.summary: Solid dark black oval shaped with no windows, wings and no sound. i only saw the object when i uploaded my images on iphoto.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting outside henry's coffee shop with several other people (all strangers who also witnessed the vent), when suddenly i noticed a distant object in the sky. at first glance it could have been a low flying jet (it was large enough), but it was flying very low, lower than a commercial craft would have been able to sustain. then the object made several turns, at a very slow speed, and when we thought it couldn't get stranger it ejected a small black pod (probably the size of a car), toward the ground. the pod proceeded to start up a separate engine (which made a thin black exhaust trail). we thought it could have been a pilot ejecting from a failing aircraft, but pilots generally don't have secondary engines in their parachutes. the black pod continued its path horizontally, above the buildings until it was out of sight. the first craft followed it at a lower speed.
content.summary: Silver cylindrical object came into sight, ejected a black pod toward the ground which flew off in a horizontal path behind a building; left a black trail of smoke.

content.detailedDescription: Driving east toward the town of belgrave in the dandenong ranges,a built up residential area in 2013.I noticed a thin moon like object in the sky above belgrave town.It was moving along at a slow rate toward the mountain it was about 11.30 to 12.30 am on a sunny late winter day, no clouds were visible. at first , i thought it was a thin moon outline but when i stopped my car and watched it ,this craft was obviously traveling on its own independently of the view from my vehicle. this craft appeared to be massive and was seemingly hanging low in the sky but, this was very hard to ascertain and i remember feeling like there was more than one way to see it. either it was very high and very massive or it was low and very big but not as massive..? the exterior outline of this craft was metallic with a beautiful saturn finish to the metal..It was a disc shape, round but with a curious tapering half way around the circle which gave the appearance of an oval nose shaped front.My impression was of an engineering quality of incredible beauty and sophistication. i immediately knew or sensed that this was not from our planet. normally i am very careful about walking across roads and traffic but on this day i walked into the middle of a two lane busy road with a fair amount of traffic , completely oblivious to the danger and only realized how dangerous this was after the craft had disappeared across the mountain and behind the foreground trees.
content.summary: Massive size, mostly invisible ,outside rim visible ,shiny metal, slightly tapered circular to oval

content.detailedDescription: I was on my way home from work and when i reached the 4 way stop i saw something large off in the distance to my left. i originally thought that it might be a blimp but as i continued to drive closer i realized that this wasn't a blimp and it wasn't an airplane. it was very large and it was flying very slowly from the north to the south. when i got to a place where i could pull over and take pictures i observed 2 cars already pulled over doing the same thing and then another car pulled over right after i did. this large object was very large and solid and the only light that it gave off was it was glowing white at the top. there were no other type of lights on it to indicate that it was a plane or anything else that would have those type of lights. it continued flying south and i eventually lost sight of it behind some trees. anyway this was something that i've never seen before and i thought i would report it to you guys to see if you could figure out just what it was.
content.summary: Observed a large object which was glowing at the top and it was slowly flying to the south.

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving between the sea world area and the vineland outlets area, through the highway, when suddenly i noticed a bright light descending quickly and then disappearing before it even hit ground.

i thought it might be a comet, but it didn't seem like it.
content.summary: Bright light descending quickly and disappearing before landing

content.detailedDescription:
This is a report of an interview i conducted of a person who was at the roswell crash site.  i am a retired engineer.
i joined the staff of the then new campus of the university of california at santa cruz.  there were several sightings of ufo's in the mountains behind the campus in 1969 and reported to the university.  i was asked to interview 3 people and file a report.  i could find on credibility or evidence in these events but, because it was a small campus and everybody in the sciences knew what was going on, i got the unwanted reputation of someone who knew about ufo's.
one day in 1970, a maintenance worker who i knew well from my church, came into my lab and said he had a friend who wanted to talk to me but did not want to meet in a public place.  i suggested we meet at my home that evening.  at the time, i did not know he wanted to tell me about a ufo incident.
that evening i was told by the two men that they had been captured by the germans during ww2 and spent a year and a half in a pow camp.  they became good friends during that time and remained so after the war.
the individual i interviewed was a welder by trade and after the war was employed at the roswell air force base welding jigs and fixtures for servicing aircraft.  he began by stating that the week before the 4th of july flying saucers would fly over the base in pairs every once in a while.  he said they were circular and had a large dome on the top.  they were flat on the bottom and were silent.  he assumed they were some technology obtained from the germans.  he said everyone working there called them "flats"
he said that he had just returned back to work after the 4th of july holiday when a truck pulled up and an officer got out and told him to load a cutting torch and fresh tanks and that they were going out to the desert.  he said that it was mid afternoon when they arrived at the crash site.  he said at the time he thought a plane had gone down.  he said they had a flatbed truck loaded with wreckage and there were soldiers on their hands and knees picking up every piece of wreckage and putting it in cloth bags.  he said the bags were the kind used for sandbags.
he said they drove a little farther out of sight from the wreckage and came upon a second group of people standing around an intact ufo.  he said the brush was knocked down indicating the craft had skidded across the ground and came to rest nosed into a natural berm with the back side slightly off the ground.
he described the craft as being about 25/26 feet in diameter with a large dome on top.  he said the craft was the 'color of weak tea' with a burnished finish.  he said there were no signs of weld marks, seams, or rivets and that all of the edges had either an inside or outside radius.  there were no visible windows or openings.  that was why he was brought there.
he  was told to cut an opening in the dome big enough for a man to crawl through.  by this time it was getting to be late afternoon and there were soldiers setting up a bank of portable lights.  he said he began cutting a hole from the base of the dome.  he said it was a tough alloy and slow cutting but the material was surprisingly thin.  he tried bending the metal out of his way as he was cutting but the metal would spring back to its original shape without creasing.
he finished his cut and set the metal piece aside and looked into the cockpit for a few seconds before he was ordered off the craft.  he said it was difficult to see very far into the craft because of the glare from the portable lights and the cockpit was full of smoke from the cutting torch.  he said he saw two beings who appeared to be dead.  he said the cockpit had a strong smell of ammonia.  he described the two beings as being about 4' tall but they were doubled up so it was hard to say.  they were wearing what he said were skin tight purplish flight suits that reminded him of sequins.  he described their heads as what we now refer to as greys.  he said there were no visible instruments that he could see.
he was ordered off the craft with his gear and returned to the air base.  he said it was dark when they arrived and he was escorted by armed guards into a building for a debriefing.  he said there were several high ranking officers at the table along with 4 or 5 civilians in suits.  he said that after he was debriefed he was told that he was not to talk about what he had seen as it was a state secret and if he was caught divulging anything he would spend the rest of his life in prison or worse.  he was scared to death by the threat and my friend and myself are the only people he ever told and that was 23 years after the event.
when we started the interview, i was told that i could not take notes or use a recorder.  he was very nervous telling the story and had to be reassured by my friend that i would not betray him.  he said that what had been described as the roswell event was not true and he wanted the truth told after his death.  he asked that i keep what he told me a secret until after his death which i have done.  he and my friend both passed away in the late 1980's
when i heard this story i did not know what to think.  i was not a ufo buff and had never heard the roswell story.  my friend said this guy was the real thing and during the interview i never sensed anything odd about his presentation or with his mannerisms.  he provided a lot more information that i have stated but the interview was almost 50 years ago and forgotten.  i think he was telling the truth.  my friend was a very honorable and trustworthy man who would knowingly support a bogus story.  i never saw or spoke the welder again after that evening.  i have shared my knowledge of this interview with a couple of investigators but i think they doubted my credibility.
content.summary: Ufo crashed

content.detailedDescription: I was on my way to circle k to get cigarettes around 3 am when i saw a weird shadow looking thing high in the sky where i live in hobe sound, florida. i watched it and noticed it was moving, descending, as it got lower i could clearly make out it was a very dark triangle shape, at this point i saw no lights, just the dark triangle. i pulled my car over to try and figure out what i'm seeing and a few seconds later three lights were suddenly on, blueish whiteish, at each point of the triangle, at this point i'm freaking out, i have my phone with me so i grab it to take a video but it wont work. the screen was kind of scrambled and then it just turned itself off. i didnt feel threatened or anything but i was kind of freaking out, at this point it's at treetop level, and very close, hovvering over seabranch blvd. i was sitting on the side of the us1 and seabranch intersection by the shopping centerwatching it hovver for about a minute before i remembered i had a pair of binoculars in my car that i used at the air show that was here last weekend. i grab them, get out of my car and look through them toward the triangle, there were windows but they were very dark. i could see two entitys, stationary, maybe the pilots? they looked very human, but at the same time, very not human. i couldn't make out a skin tone exactly but from what i could see, they looked very very very pale. the triangle then ascended and then hovvered maybe 500 feed or so above the trees. it then began to slowly head south and i got back in my car and started to follow. the craft was going very slowly, i was driving about 20mph to keep up with it from a distance, i didnt feel threatened but i also didn't want to be noticed. i followed for about a mile when suddenly the lights on the craft went out, i could still see the craft, just not the lights. at that point my radio got very loud and sounded like all the stations were skipping between eachother, a few seconds later my car died. just completely stopped. i looked back over in the direction i last saw the triangle and it was gone. i got out of my car and looked all around and i couldnt find it. my car then turned back on its own. i don't know what i saw but i know it was not a human craft, and it was not piloted by human pilots.
content.summary: Hovvered near us1-seabranch, may have landed, hovvered again, headed toward ocean.

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were driving from albuquerque to carlsbad and stopped in roswell to grab a bite to eat and continue on our way.  after eating (well after sunset) we headed back on the main road out of town.  stopping at a red light, behind a couple cars, in our truck(vehicles all around us) we both noticed and said out loud the object that was coming straight towards us from the dark sky.  in the two weeks prior we had seen "lights" in the sky (around albuquerque) and thought this was going to be the same, nope.  this one was huge in comparison to the far away sightings we had seen before and close!  i didn't have time to take out my camera or to think really because i didn't want to miss what was happening.  the object had lights on all ends, the front(or back) was more triangular with bright white lights, the back(or front) which was closest to us was more rounded but still triangular and had bright red, green and blue lights shining down.  it was larger than our truck, appeared to be a solid object and appeared out of "nowhere" and coming straight towards us.  i didn't know what i thought it was and after speaking with my husband later he described he thought maybe an optical illusion but then dismissed it right away because i was at a different view point and there was no mistaking it was an object of sorts, not just lights from reflections.  so we first noticed it being about no more than 20 feet in front of us about eye level, it slowly and at the same time quickly moved right to us and then stopped/hovered right over top of our truck, i thought i would be able to look out the back window and continue to follow its motion, but it was no where in sight when i did and at the same time the traffic light was turning green (husband was driving) and we started driving forward.  i felt like numb, like did that really just happen and where did the thing go?  also, i didn't have time to think in the moment, but later wondered, did the other cars see it too??  they must have.  my husbands accounts of what occurred are right in line with everything that happened.  i felt like it could have been a dream, but it was definitely real life.  all this happened over the span of maybe 5-7 seconds and then everything was normal (ish) again.  this was not the first experience i've had but definitely the strangest and one worth reporting, i hope to have some light (no pun intended) shed on what happened that night.  i must also say that on our trip home the following night we did see a black helicopter carrying something large underneath it- it was too far in the distance to fully capture and i was exhausted of thinking by that point.  i don't know where that was or what time and is not the original report, just had to mention.  thank you!
content.summary: Driving from albuquerque to carlsbad, stopped at red light-very large, bright, low object (long,rectangular w triangle front or back)coming straight at us, it stopped right over our truck and when i looked out back to see it again, it was gone.

content.detailedDescription: I was siting down listening to music when i seen something that i have never seen before. it was a very cold day in fall so maybe the ufos wanted to get a good look or something. i have seen planes ,drones ,and blimps before but i have never seen a object so bright. it looked like a meteor or a fairy coming slowly to earth. there were maybe 5 or more and i could tell it was a ufo by how slow they were hovering and the extreme bright blue light that glowed like a star.  it seemed like they were slowly hovering over the area to observe something.  i know that this way a ufo cause i could see  the shape past the blue lights it was a cigar kinda  of shaped object  and i think i seen inside of it.
content.summary: I was sitting on my balcony when i seen about 5 glowing objects just floating ,they were not moving. th y slowly started to move away but i knew it was a ufo because i could see it. i seen right through the ufo it looked like a computer room or something

content.detailedDescription: Filmed from television screen during live footage of oregon political protest. 3 small white objects move very fast above the crowd.
content.summary: Small, white, glowing objects moving extremely fast above crowd during protest

content.detailedDescription: Wife and i were returning from voting and while driving i noticed 8 diamond shaped orbs a dull orange or copper like in color appearing bright but also dull in color (not very bright); the 8 objects were about a 1/2 mile originally and then closed in to about 1,000 feet hovering about 500 feet in the air. 4 descended below the tree line out of view and then two disappeared and the other two ascended straight up out of view but not at the same time. the one's that descended previous came back into view and then descended again not to re-appear. the objects were about 7 times as large as venus during sunset. they appeared to be quite large even at the distance given. wife and i were driving different vehicles in tandem and upon seeing the 8 objects we pulled over to view the event. i could not determine what the objects were as it was not an aircraft of any kind and they had no noise with them. i normally would have been extremely excited but the election had my mind pretty busy that evening. the tree line blocked 4 of the objects and the last two ascended slowly into the sky and disappeared at a high altitude.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: I was driving home along catherine heights in hot springs alongside a country residential area and noticed 8 larger copper shaped diamonds in the sky some descending and ascending and then disappearing from view.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving down the road in about a nwn direction. it looked like a shooting star. it traveled above me in a straight path and was out of sight in less than 4 seconds. it was too fast to be a shooting star. plush shooting stars tend to have slight trails, this did not.
content.summary: Looked like a shooting star in many ways.

content.detailedDescription:
Hello,
i have heard a weird humming sound, off and on since about oct 2014. first time i thought it was coming from tv, at 12:30 am, not sure exact date. anyway, after i couldn't locate source inside, i went out the front door to listen so i could figure out what the heck it was. this sound is very peculiar and i half expected to look up to see something. i did not. but i have travelled all over within a mile or so from my house and this sound is exactly the same, coming from all directions. several of my neighbors have heard it and i have spoken to other people from western co who have heard it too. whatever it is from, it seems to me that it must be associated with a great deal of power, because it must have very large wavefronts, or else you would be able to tell its direction. based on descriptions i've seen of the taos hum, this is not the same, this being a higher frequency. it is still occurring at 11:03 pm mst and has changed pitch slightly (lower) since approx 10:35 pm.
content.summary: Humming sound, like semi truck tires on the hwy at night. omnidirectional. recurring since about oct of 2014.

content.detailedDescription: At 10pm, i was driving home from work. i turned down the street from my home and noticed an odd light in the sky (south of my home). i really couldn't get a good look because i was driving so i made a right turn so i could pull over and take a good look. when i turned the next corner i noticed 5 lights in the sky. i could tell they were not from a plane or helicopter. i parked and watched the lights move around. headed in the east direction from the west. i don't remember seeing 1 of the lights disappear but i could only see 4 lights by the time i pulled out my phone to take a pic. the lights were moving slowly and not in a straight path. the light's moved around eachother. this lasted about 5 minutes. then they headed up and disappeared, maybe into the clouds. i don't know how long these lights were in plain view, for i only noticed them when i turned the corner to look at the other light i noticed south of them.
content.summary: I saw 5 lights then 4 lights traveling from the west headed east. not in a solid straight path, they mover around eachother. then after 5 min they headed up and disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: When i took the picture, the colors outside were so vibrant, i don't think i've ever seen the sky, trees, or being outside be more invigorating. i noticed in the sky that a contrail had lines going up in a patterned fashion.  i live under multiple plane fly paths and don't remember ever seeing a contrail do that in 10 years. i grabbed my phone since i've never seen a contrail do that before and a cloud appeared in 2 pictures 1 minute apart that has the features of an alien head with its right arm raised to the sky. obviously its a friendly one.
content.summary: Contrail and cloud

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home from work on 52nd street towards van buren.  looked to the left in the sky and saw what looked like four flares spiraling down from the sky.  then they all stopped together.  they hovered there for a couple seconds, moved into a square shape.  then they spiraled down again for a couple seconds, then lined up in a horizontal line.  i lost sight of them when i pulled into my apartment complex for a second but when i looked back up, they were gone.  not sure what i saw but it was weird.  this all happend around 7:30pm tonight.
content.summary: Looked like 4 falling flares. then they stopped, fell a couple seconds, went square shaped, lined up and disappeared

content.detailedDescription: Two other people and myself were driving on route 3 south going into massachusetts from nh.  suddenly, my passenger points out this strange group of objects in the sky.  they began zipping around in the sky, so i pulled over.  i was in shock.  they had merged from nine different objects, into three. i didnt know what to do, so i started driving again and got off the next exit which was maybe three hundred feet or so.  i pulled over again and my friends were searching the sky's and eventually spotted them again.  when i went and looked in my rear view mirror at them, the three merged into one, and with the brightest flash of light i've ever seen, they were gone.  my friend in the back seat began to cry, and my other friend used thumbtacks on his wall to dictate the positions of the original group.
content.summary: Saw a group of ufo's flying in formation then merging.

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I was driving home along waller avenue and had just passed over the train tracks.  the object in the sky had a bright light on it. at first i thought it was a helicopter with a spotlight. but the light like... dimmed suddenly and all that was left was this weird egg shaped object in the sky. it was dark colored but still a different color than the night sky because i could still make out the object. the bright light i had seen previously now looked almost muted. like there was a screen over it? it still casted an outline/shadow around the object. the object just hovered there for probably 1-2 minutes. i literally stopped my car because i had never seen anything like that before. another car came up behind me so i turned onto the next street to get out of its way but the object was gone. like no trace of it at all. i felt very eerie and i had no idea what to do. my house was another 30 seconds away and when i pulled up and got out of my car, i heard so much dog barking from all over. could just be a coincide though. when i got inside i went to google and typed "i just saw a ufo" and it lead me to this site. i just thought i ought to tell someone. i never seen anything like this.
content.summary: Possible ufo sighting in lexington, ky

content.detailedDescription:
On november 5, 2016  at 7:52 pm my wife called me from the road as she was coming home from our daughter and son-in-law's house. she had just turned south on 35th avenue off of pinnacle peak road. she told me to go outside and look to the southern sky. i ran outside and what i saw literally took my breath away - there was a fleet, that's the only way we can describe it, of between 18-25 golden glowing orbs spreading across the sky, all moving in formation without making any noise at all. they were in sight for about 10 minutes, or so. my wife could tell how shocked i was, and told me she would soon be home. she had the best view of this sighting as she drove over adobe dam on her way home. she had an elevated view as she crested the dam. after hanging up the phone i ran around to the other side of the house, and started taking pictures. i realize now that i should have been taking a video, rather than taking still pictures, but i was so shocked that i could barely think. we watched as the objects moved and they sort of vibrated, and were primarily a beautiful amber color, that once and a while would very faintly flash blue, red, and white. they all had an aura surrounding them that made them appear larger than they probably were. they moved from southwest to northeast, and as i was watching the last few that we could see - my wife had run inside and got a pair of binoculars- i saw them blinking out,disappearing as they got farther away. i saw the last one blink golden, white, golden, white and then they were all gone. 
in our neighborhood there were several parties going on, and we could here people talking loudly. the most commotion was at a party occurring at the eagles club just south of our house on rose garden. my wife and i were completely astonished and left in amazement. we were mostly not scared at all, but intimidated by the shear numbers of the crafts.
content.summary: Sighting of between 18-25 golden-amber, glowing, orbs all moving together in formation coming over sw horizon toward nw  before all  "blinking" out or leaving the atmosphere..

content.detailedDescription:
1.Around the house are outside.
2.I'm always on the look out for ufo.
3.Some type of high tech government drone at the least.
4.Its right there just hovering gets nice and close to show its size at first then hovers out or up like acting as if a star. but when close white blue triangle tips almost like a hollowgram. and it just watches you.
5.I feel like its knows its watching me and its knows i see it and knows its a ufo so i usually get irritated and annoyed.
6.I just get sick of it cause its there every night and not bought to stand out side evernight with the bugs. i could walk out side and the thing would probably mess with some more.
content.summary: Its been coming out everynight. same area.

content.detailedDescription: Me and my wife were observing the half moon,  when suddenly to the right of the moon and seemed to be around 25000 ft, she said to me, do you see that and i said yes, we saw a very very bright object moving at a very high speed, and 3 seconds later it vanished. i blew us away, i didn't have a light pulse like a plane, and i waited for that to occur again, but as i said it just vanished. i have never witnessed something like this. i observed the sky for another hour but saw nothing more.
content.summary: Observed a very bright object for about 3 to 4 secs when it just vanished.
content.locationName: Santa Catarina, State of Santa Catarina

content.detailedDescription: I've been around the world any i've seen these things everywhere and there not stars.
content.summary: Its there in the same area evernight just observation

content.detailedDescription: We stepped outside to have a smoke and happened to look up to the northeast and at fist glance thought we were seeing a fireball meteor. looking closer it resembled a plane blazing on fire as it descended in the east very slowly like a parachute. then it leveled out at maybe 500 to 1,000 feet and changed to a more direct eastern direction. as its descent slowed the light went out. by then we estimate it was 4-5 miles away. we often see military helicopters going in that general direction, but do not know if this is related. we are worried that something may have crashed after it caught on fire.
content.summary: Looked like plane with intense orange fire losing altitude heading ne changed to easterly descended as glow went out

content.detailedDescription: leaving graduation meeting around 615 my father looked up into the sky and saw this for like object floating it was about a mile away so he said get in the car we're going to follow it.  that was in niles ohio then we made our way to boards town near the gm plant around 636-ish the object seem to appear bigger and it seem to stop in hover in some spots with bright lights around it. there was no path to follow in the object so we were not able to follow it to our fullest potential  what seemed to be like a star a first turned into a ufo chase because there was no possible way it was a plane or a star.  we contacted the  boards town police department around 653.
content.summary: diamond shaped object that seem to move then stop the move then stop and hover

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were driving home (we live in downtown madison) from the west side of madison after shopping. i simply noticed the object because of how bright it was, and actually thought it was a tiny chunk of a rainbow forming, although there hadn't been any rain that day, until i noticed quickly hiw much light it was giving off on its own. it was just sort of hovering, colors changed a bit. i just remember feeling uncomfortable and worried about it. i didn't feel like it should be there, not sure it just made me very anxious i suppose. i'm not completely sure of its exact direction, as we were driving home in a curved pattern (the city is on an isthmus between two lakes). i just know when i first saw it we were in west madison facing east, the brightness of the glow sort of had little spurts of being brighter and slightly less, and it gave off blue, orange, green, reddish colors, and about half an hoe later when we got home i saw it again but this time we had moved east 20 miles and i saw it when i faced about sw. i had been trying to take a picture the whole car ride and couldn't catch it with its moving directions, but this photo i did get was at the end of the event where i last saw it from a block outside my building. you can see the sun setting on the right, and the object glowing it's own light and some of the colors to the left.
content.summary: Large glowing ball emanating own light like second mini sun
